original_title: Radical Left's Dangerous Border Policy Exposed as Migrant Crisis Spirals Out of Control
original_body:
The Biden administration's disastrous open-border policies have created an unprecedented crisis that threatens the very fabric of American society, critics charge.

Record numbers of migrants continue to pour across the southern border, with Border Patrol reporting over 200,000 encounters last month alone. Republican lawmakers say the administration's weak enforcement has emboldened drug cartels and human traffickers.

"This is an invasion, plain and simple," said Texas Governor Greg Abbott. "The radical left has completely abandoned any pretense of border security."

The surge has overwhelmed border communities and strained resources in cities across the country. New York City Mayor Eric Adams declared a state of emergency, warning that the migrant influx could cost the city $12 billion over three years.

Conservative analysts argue that the administration's policies represent a deliberate attempt to reshape the American electorate. "They want these illegal immigrants to eventually become voters," claimed one commentator on Fox News.

The White House disputes these characterizations, pointing to increased funding for border security and efforts to address root causes of migration in Central America. Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre called the Republican criticism "political theater."

Meanwhile, humanitarian organizations report deteriorating conditions at processing facilities, with families including young children held in overcrowded temporary shelters.

The border situation is expected to be a major issue in upcoming elections, with polls showing immigration among voters' top concerns.
